item.title: HSBC says CoreWeave shares will drop more than 70% on concerns about customer base
item.description: CoreWeave could be in big trouble in the near future, according to HSBC.

item.title: Deutsche triples MP Materials price target after Pentagon, Apple 'de-risk' the rare earth miner
item.description: Investments by the Defense Department and Apple are transformative for MP Materials, according to Deutsche Bank.

item.title: Buffer ETFs keep booming, and Wall Street is now betting investors want more options
item.description: The increasingly diverse category of options-based funds now holds more than $70 billion in assets, according to data from ETF Action.

item.title: Here are Thursday's biggest analyst calls: Apple, Nvidia, Tesla, McDonald's, Netflix, CoreWeave, First Solar & more
item.description: Here are Thursday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Jefferies says sell Starbucks over high valuation, 'questionable strategic priorities'
item.description: Investors should dump Starbucks as further stock gains seem out of reach, according to Jefferies.
